thread.title: U.S. Won’t Prosecute Former IRS Official Lois Lerner
thread.title_full: U.S. Won’t Prosecute Former IRS Official Lois Lerner - WSJ

author: Richard Rubin
title: U.S. Won’t Prosecute Former IRS Official Lois Lerner
text:
WASHINGTON—The Justice Department won’t charge Lois Lerner or anyone else involved in the Internal Revenue Service’s treatment of Tea Party groups.
The agency disclosed its decision Friday in a letter to members of Congress.
“Our investigation uncovered substantial evidence of mismanagement, poor judgment and institutional inertia,...
